Technology and Services', 'Internet', 'Leisure, Travel & Tourism']",Engineering,"Since Bookingcom started facilitating bookings in 1996, the amount of data produced and consumed has increased in unimaginable proportions 20TBday, certainly from the perspective of our founders The last decade, open source data tools Hive, Spark, Cassandra and Kafka running on large internal server parks enabled hundreds of colleagues working closely with data to produce various data products, eg in Machine Learning and Analytics As the community has grown, so have the number of challenges around working with data Providing flexible compute resources introduced the onset of clouds in parallel to a heavily utilized onpremise environment Governments introduce standards for personal data protection A growing and physically more disconnected employeebase is less able to share tribal knowledge regarding data finesses Hence the establishment of Enterprise Data Management, a group governing the production and consumption of data, so it can be trusted and understood, , You would work as a Manager of Data Engineering for EDM You are a technical subject matter expert and organisational leader who drives data engineering strategies and delivery for a team, through handson execution and people management Working closely with other technology and product leads, you will drive the data engineering development which includes Development  Engineering, System Engineering and all Business Lines RD SRM is responsible for keeping information security risks within the RD risk appetite by identifying and assessing risks, driving risk mitigation and monitoring execution, As an Identity Access Manager IAM you will manage the IAM Roles and Rules in the RD domain, which is a challenging position in an international technology driven enterprise Throughout the company multiple disciplines are in place to reduce risks related to application and data access, You will have a close relationship with the IAM service providers, IAM colleagues of other sectors of ASML and IAM stakeholders within the RD business and application landscape, As part of this profile you will be responsible for, , , , Support in the Operations Managers Reporting to the International Federation Red Cross Red Crescent IFRC regional Disaster Management DM unit or an IFRC Operations Coordinator, the Operations Manager will oversee the coordination of timely, efficient and effective IFRC support to a host National Societies NS in responding to sudden and slow onset disasters and crises events, , Delegates seconded to the IFRC will provide leadership for management of IFRC disaster and crises assistance in support of a local National Society in an affected country Shehe supports the National Society in successful planning and implementation of appropriate response To achieve this aim, the Operations Manager works collectively and closely with the Disaster Management and technical units, regional and country offices of the IFRC, and focal points from the local National Society The Operations Manager is often the only delegate deployed to directly support the national society in the management of relief operations and must therefore be able to work independently and with minimal supervision Typical deployments are 312 months in duration, with the possibility of extension, , While delegates are recruited to deploy internationally with the IFRC, the CRC also uses its register of Operations Managers for domestic disaster management opportunities Within domestic operations, Operations Managers could be inserted into senior level positions resulting in the need to be able to rapidly understand and navigate new and complex operations We ask all candidates who are engaged in this register to be reporting to the Manager Engineering Responsibilities As a Senior Mechanical Engineer, you are ultimately responsible for the definition and selection of mechanical equipment and piping components inside the installations You will set the standard for global application within Total and its affiliates You must ensure that the installations function as intended according to the functional design plan And ensure that the design is up to date with all the safety, mechanical and functional demands Of course, you will keep a keen eye on the costs as well, in order to deliver an operational and affordable station to the client Project planning and progress reporting are part of the jobAs knowledge focal point you will play a key role in communication between our organization and our clients What exactly are you going to doDesign or specify the mechanical parts of the installations, in line with Total Group principles, as well as national, European and international standards, rules and regulations, with emphasis on CAPEXOPEXconstructability, maintainability and operabilityParticipate in HAZOP studies, as well as constructability, maintainability and operability reviewsReport on planning and progress of projectsDevelop mechanical standards in your field, make these available to the relevant affiliates in the group and set KPIs for performanceBuild and maintain a network of connections with affiliates in the groupThe ideal Senior Mechanical Engineer Since we will be setting the standards for the future, we are looking for an innovative and entrepreneurial person You agree with us that, apart from creativity, it is important to document our work in terms of basis, process and outcome of our designs Preferably you have experience with our type of installations Your profileMasters degree in mechanical engineering with at least 10 years of professional experience on complex process installationsKnowledge of and experience with national, European and international standards, rules and regulations as applied in the process industryKnowledge of and experience with CNG, LNG, andor H2installations is a plusKnowledge of English language, knowledge of Dutch andor French are strongly advisedEffective, coaching, cooperative, analyticProject oriented person and good communication skills both verbal and writtenWhy you should join us We are a solid company with clear growth ambitions Total Gas Mobility has a major stake in Totals NetZero2050 climate ambition The position is challenging with room for initiative and responsibility You have career opportunities to expand beyond this role Within the Total Group we strive for diversity and welcome openminded, daring and caring people in tune with the Total spirit We offer an attractive salary in line with your age and experience And last, but not least, you will have the opportunity to work with us to create a better future Total Gas Mobility Total is a major energy player that produces and markets fuels, natural gas and lowcarbon electricity Our 100,000 employees are committed to better energy that is safer, more affordable, cleaner and accessible to as many people as possible Active in more than 130 countries, our ambition is to become the responsible energy majorOn January 1st, 2020, PitPoints offerings merged into the Total group A global competence centre for natural gas for vehicles NGV, renewable biomethane and hydrogen gas H2 for mobility, including customised public transport solutions across all new energies, and small scale LNG for mobility  industry use, is now located at PitPoints former HQ in Nieuwegein and operating under the name Total Gas MobilityTogether, we strive for sustainable mobility with low carbon fuels, and contribute to our companys NetZero2050 climate 'Staffing and Recruiting', 'Oil & Energy']",Engineering,"Are you interested in contributing to the development of innovative CNG, LNG and H2 fueling stations Setting standards for pressure equipment and piping as part of stateoftheart installations which will be used all over the word Then we have the perfect job for you, , , , Total Gas Mobility TGM is navigating the Total group in its mission to become a world leader in natural, renewable and hydrogen gas mobility, and smallscale LNG by 2030, One of its fields of expertise is supplying CNG, LNG and H2 fueling stations The stations are stateof theart, with extremely high pressures up to 1000bar and highpower rotating equipment, We will be setting the standard for all Total stations worldwide towards the future This means that you will have a big influence on how stations are going to look like and function, Within Total Gas Mobility you will be part of the Production and Engineering department and you will be reporting to the Manager Engineering, , , , As a Senior Mechanical Engineer, you are ultimately responsible for the definition and selection of mechanical equipment and piping components inside the installations You will set the standard for global application within Total and its affiliates You must ensure that the installations function as intended according to the functional design plan And ensure that the design is up to date with all the safety, mechanical and functional demands Of course, you will keep a keen eye on the costs as well, in order to deliver an operational and affordable station to the client Project planning and progress reporting are part of the job, As knowledge focal point you will play a key role in communication between our organization and our clients, , , , , , Since we will be setting the standards for the future, we are looking for an innovative and entrepreneurial person You agree with us that, apart from creativity, it is important to document our work in terms of basis, process and outcome of our designs Preferably you have experience with our type of installations, , , , , We are a solid company with clear growth ambitions Total Gas Mobility has a major stake in Totals NetZero2050 climate ambition The position is challenging with room for initiative and responsibility You have career opportunities to expand beyond this role Within the Total Group we strive for diversity and welcome openminded, daring and caring people in tune with the Total spirit We offer an attractive salary in line with your age and experience And last, but not least, you will have the opportunity to work with us to create a better future, , , Total is a major energy player that produces and markets fuels, natural gas and lowcarbon electricity Our 100,000 employees are committed
